long_description: The Patagonia Silkweight Print boxers bring supersoft, easy-going comfort that will have you shunning your old cotton standbys. Quick-drying polyester fabric offers easy care and superior moisure transfer; fabric is partially recycled. Gladiodor(R) natural odor control employs benign amino acids to help keep funky scents at bay; plus, it's nonpolluting, safe and durable. Elastic waistband feels comfortable against skin. The Patagonia Silkweight Print boxers include a functional fly.
short_description: The Patagonia Silkweight Print boxers bring supersoft, easy-going comfort that will have you shunning your old cotton standbys.
